acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped short values with @PodamShortValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleShortValuesWithThePodamShortValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.ShortValuePojo

Then the Object ShortRangeValuesPojo ( shortFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 shortFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 94 shortFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 25 shortObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 0 shortObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 77 shortObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 10 shortFieldWithPreciseValue = 17 ) should not be null
Then the value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the short value 94 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the short value 25 should be between 0 and 1000
Then the Object 0 should not be null
Then the value 0 should be greater or equal than 0
Then the Object 94 should not be null
Then the short value 77 should be lower or equal than 100
Then the Object 10 should not be null
Then the short value 10 should be between 0 and 100
Then the short value 17 should be precisely 17
